name: Raleigh
content:
Raleigh was a human male technician who served the Galactic Republic aboard Relay Post Epsilon One. While overseeing the operation of the space station, Raleigh forgot to activate the Targes scanner, a device that warned of starships arriving from hyperspace. Upon reactivating the scanner, the relay post was attacked by the Lourna Dee, the starship of Nihil Tempest Runner Lourna Dee.
Raleigh was voiced by Vikas Adam in the 2021 audio drama The High Republic: Tempest Runner, written by Cavan Scott.
